item.description:
Hey All,

I'm sure you have heard of this show by now, but Earthfest is coming up next Saturday and Cake is going to be headlining. The lineup this year will be Cracker, The English Beat, BoDeans and Cake will headline. Cake usually puts on a great show, i'm really looking forward to seeing them again, especially at an outside venue. The hatchshell is located close to the Charles MGH stop on the Redline.

Earthfest starts at 12:00, there is going to be a bunch of other bands as well as a ton of free stuff handed out. Everyone should stop by for a little while, hopefully it will be good weather. If you want more info, go to this site -

http://www.bostonradi...

Give me a call if you want to hang out at the show, I'll probably get there mid-afternoon and be wandering around.

Hope to see you all there.

Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Give me a call, there will be a sea of people 7013310920
item.why: Its Free and there is Cake!
item.name: Earthfest Saturday May 24th - Free Concert
